I'd highly recommend watching "Rob Roy" if you're in the mood for a captivating costume drama. This film, set in 18th century Scotland, tells the story of Rob Roy MacGregor's journey seeking revenge against a nobleman who wronged him. Liam Neeson delivers a riveting performance as the titular character.

Alternatively, "Dances with Wolves" is another fantastic choice. This Oscar-winning movie immerses you in the world of the Sioux tribe and their interactions with a Civil War soldier, played by Kevin Costner, offering a unique perspective on American history.
